content.text: I just got back from a week-long trip to Japan! It was amazing!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Japan. What was your favorite part?
It's hard to pick just one favorite part, but I think I'd have to say the food. I had the best sushi I've ever had there.
I love sushi! I'm glad you had a great time. Where else have you traveled to?
I've been to a lot of places, but my other favorite place is Italy. I love the food, the culture, and the people.
I've never been to Italy, but it's on my list! What's your favorite thing about Italy?
The food! I'm a big foodie, and the food in Italy is amazing. I love all the fresh pasta and pizza.
I love pasta and pizza too! Do you have any other hobbies besides traveling?
I love to horseback ride. I used to ride all the time when I was younger, but I haven't had a chance to do it in a while.
That sounds like fun! I've never been horseback riding, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get exercise.
